description: SCMProviderGeneratorAzureDevOps defines connection info specific to Azure DevOps.

accessTokenRef.description: Utility struct for a reference to a secret key.

allBranches.description: Scan all branches instead of just the default branch.

api.description: The URL to Azure DevOps. If blank, use https://dev.azure.com.

teamProject.description: Azure Devops team project. Required. E.g. "my-team".
